mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Fourth Year Class, 1944-1945
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Holsinger's Studio (Charlottesville, Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Class of 1945. Identified (L to R): First row: Miller Shannon Allen Jr., Melvin Gustavus Alper, Theodoro Alberto Arias, Max Baumeister Jr., Marshall David Baxter, William Earl Bloomer, Robert Stewart Boyd, Wade Hampton Brannon, Franklin Talmadge Buchanan, Ann Butterworth, William Dimmock Buxton, Samuel Henley Carter, Lewis Smith Chase Second row: Crawford Hal Cleveland Jr., Charles Lucian Crockett Jr., Dahar Cury Jr., James Austin Davis Jr., Wilber Russell Ellis Jr., Francis Wilbur Fitzhugh Jr., William Cary Fleming, Charles Irving Fuller Jr., Don Abbot Gaddis, Martin Edward Gallagher Jr., George Benjamin Garis, Carl William Gottschalk Third row: Louis Sparkman Graham Jr., Clifton Rhodes Gruver, Herbert Durant Gullick, John Pinckney Harloe, Lloyd Bratton Harrison Jr., William Klipstein Harryman Jr., Jack Lee Herrell, Myers Hampton Hicks, Marcel Jerome Hornowski, Robert Price Irons, Herbert Murray Levitt, Fourth row: David Benjamin Levy, William Dulaney Lewis Jr., Raeburn Carson Llewellyn, Stephen Brooks Longley, Richard Hubert Lowe Jr., David Smythe McKee, Lawrence Samuel Miller, Richard Deaton Nauman, William Rankin Nelson, Henry Clay Newsome Jr., William Milholland Patterson, Mason Romaine III Fifth row: Charles Alfred Rothfuss, William Laird Sager, Edward Van Zile Scott, Milton Segal, Donald Shotton, Acors William Thompson, Thomas Murrell Thornhill Jr., Edwin Booth Vaden, Frederick Victor Vance Jr. On back of photo: "Absent: Lewis Frazier Bell, Jack Lee Herrell, Leonidas Rosser Littleton Jr., Edward John Lowell Jr., Lewis George Richards Jr., Ralph Robbins, George Ward Shannon"
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
